organizations.name: Fulbright Association
quotes: In establishing the prize, the Fulbright Association and its cooperating American and foreign associates sought to provide substantial recognition to individuals who dedicate their energies to improving international understanding and to encourage new generations to undertake life commitments to international understanding.
Dr. R. Fenton-May, Director, Fulbright Association

quotes: The Fulbright Prize is made possible through a grant by The Coca-Cola Foundation.

issues.description: The role 'Ambassador' and the mention of 'Fulbright Fellow' might suggest this is an award rather than a career position.
